name: quick_start
description:
Memory quick start. Key points:
- Each database fixes its embedding size at creation (F32_BLOB(N)).
- On startup, the server detects the DB’s size and adapts provider outputs to match (padding/truncation).
- You can switch providers/models without recreating the DB; query vectors must still match the DB’s size exactly.
- See health_check for current EmbeddingDims.
- Optional env EMBEDDINGS_ADAPT_MODE: pad_or_truncate (default) | pad | truncate.
